subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees  will return to the Bronx on Friday night and will hold their annual Old-Timers’ Day on Saturday, and both of those games appear to be shaping up as tributes to George Steinbrenner.
snippet: The Yankees  will return to the Bronx on Friday night and will hold their annual Old-Timers’ Day on Saturday, and both of those games appear to be shaping up as tributes to George Steinbrenner.
